rules_text:
Haste
[i]Heroes United[/i] – Whenever you cast a legendary creature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
[i]Nóatún[/i] – {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Until end of turn, whenever a legendary creature you control deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token. Activate this ability only as a sorcery and once each turn.
